.. _usefulmarkups:

.. note::
    Make sure file name (usefulmarkups.rst) and reference (_usefulmarkups) are the same.

.. warning::
    Both of file name and reference **DO NOT** accept underscore *"useful_markups.rst"* or *"_useful_markups"* in between name.

Useful Markup & Implementation:
===============================

To insert an inline image meaning insert an image in between your text such as a button icon.

1. Create a image with jpg or png

2. You type the word you want to use **New** |myInlineButton| for image.

.. |myInlineButton| image:: /images/my_next_button.jpg
                    :scale: 65%
